extensionDescription.message: Context menu item to jump to the closest anchor to the selected text (if any) or to the right-click point otherwise.

jumpToAnchorClick.message: Jump to anchor (relative to click point)

separateContextMenus.message: Use separate context menus (one relative to right-click point and another to selection)?

enableCopyContextMenu.message: Enable the "copy-paste from anchor point" context menu
